alert.note: Alert for Western Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 13 at 4:58AM AKST until February 14 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 12 PM TO 9 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 50 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Western Aleutians. * WHEN...From 12 PM to 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak winds are expected Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening as a strong low pushes its front across the Western Aleutians. Gusty winds combined with snowfall may lead to periods of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
